vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλιέζερ(Heb. אֱלִיעֶזֶר), ὁ, indecl.,
Eliezer, an ancestor of Jesus: Luk.3:29.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29;
son of: Jorim (G2497);
father of: Joshua (G2424K)
§ Eliezer, "God [El] is [my] help"
Eliezer, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:29*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利以謝 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝是他的幫助"
約令的兒子,耶穌基督的家譜 (路 3:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以利以谢 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝是他的帮助"
约令的儿子,耶稣基督的家谱 (路 3:29)
